alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Franklin; Fulton; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 8:29PM EDT until July 15 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Franklin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southern Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Somerset County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 828 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Berlin to near Berkeley Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bedford, Breezewood, Warfordsburg, Berlin, Clearville, Everett, Mercersburg, Central City, Buffalo Mills, Big Cove Tannery, Crystal Springs and Needmore. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 70 from mile markers 148 to 170. The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 120 to 162. Interstate 99 from mile markers 0 to 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
